title: Student participation
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Ministry of Education, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/School children - Victoria

description: Episode of Series "Chalkface". A look at various aspects of student participation in a number of different primary schools in Victoria. Covers curriculum decision-making in the classroom, students running school assemblies, writing school rules and regional meetings of school leaders.
